meaning: (To a woman) obtain sexual favors, sexually harass
description: Besides the dictionary meaning of 「to tease, to joke」, it is also used in the same way as sexual harassment (xing sao rao) and to take liberties with someone. Many people use 「eating tofu」 (chi doufu) as a euphemism for 「sexual harassment」. There is a theory that because tofu is highly nutritious and eating it is said to make skin fine and fair (hence the term 「Tofu Beauty」), this expression came about.

examples.translation: My wife was sexually harassed during a massage

examples.chinese: 美女去健身房被吃豆腐
examples.translation: A beautiful woman went to the gym and was sexually harassed

examples.chinese: 今天在学校被吃豆腐了,怎么办
examples.translation: I was sexually harassed at school today, what should I do?
